title: Millionairess who accused Sir Philip Green of 'octopus-like' behaviour to testify against tycoon
text:
A millionairess neighbour of Sir Philip Green who accused him of “octopus-like” behaviour will testify against the tycoon at his US trial, court documents have revealed.

Prosecutors have named Kimberley Khoury among witnesses prepared to give evidence against Sir Philip after he was charged with four counts of assault earlier this year.

It comes after Katie Surridge, a 38-year-old pilates instructor, told the Telegraph that the tycoon groped her on two occasions at the luxury Canyon Ranch health club in Tucson, Arizona. When tracked down by this newspaper Ms Khoury - who lives at the resort - confirmed that she saw Sir Philip “fondling” Mrs Surridge’s bottom repeatedly.

Police then launched an...
description: A millionairess neighbour of Sir Philip Green who accused him of “octopus-like” behaviour will testify against the tycoon at his US trial, court documents have revealed.
